title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected.
OB: No action or response is observed when clicking on the first Combo.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Click on the first Combo.
